title: 255. Planting The Meat Seed
description:
👉ORIGINAL GRAIN: Use code CONGRATS at originalgrain.com/congrats to get 30% OFF sitewide

In this week's episode Chris smells the yemon, visits Broadmoor, and wonders how good Top Gun could actually be. Plus Kristin shaves a couch. Did you not believe in this episode? Cause GOD DID!
